transArray.content:
It feels like a high-tech youth theme. . . But it feels a little far away from being intelligent, so the windows can be lifted and lowered electrically?
The room is understandably small, but the design is poor. The sink is close to the table, and items can only be mixed together.

There is almost no service, because there is not enough manpower, it feels like it is to save costs.
You basically have to rely on yourself.

The experience is average, and I will not consider it in the future.
